bibl.title: Demarco v. McKay. Statement from Police Chief Continued
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image.

org.orgName: United States District Court of Washington Territory, Second Judicial District

div1.p: about to Depart from the city of Tacoma where he threw every was arrested said Frank Demarco and connected him to prison in said city on said suspicion. That he was directed so to do by the sheriff of county Texas and that with all the haste possible he proceeded to matter of his the said Frank Demarco alleged crime her that before he had had time to sufficiently uniform himself as to file a complaint against him the said Demarco this writ was sewed upon him, that he has filed a complaint said Demarco under section 9 & 3 of he case of Washington Territory, that he now holds the said Frank Demarco by virtue and authority of a warrant of arrest issued to him for the arrest of said Demarco by A.E. Lawrence a justice of the peace of Pierce County Washington Territory a copy of said warrant in hereto attached worked Exlubir "a" and under a part here for reventilles the body of the said Rank Demarco he now has here to for your honor together with the said writ as therein commanded
